TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlTableCell extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl

summary.span: 表示 对象中的 和 HTML 元素。

span.span: Represents the and HTML elements in an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ``元素表示表中的数据单元，而 `` 元素表示表头单元格。The `` element represents a data cell in a table, while the `` element represents a table heading cell. 使用 类以编程方式控制 `` 对象中的和 `` HTML 元素 。Use the class to programmatically control the `` and `` HTML elements in an object. 通过使用类，您可以通过指定背景色、边框颜色、高度和宽度自定义表格中单元格的外观。The class allows you to customize the appearance of a cell in a table by specifying the background color, the border color, the height, and the width. 这些属性使用 、 、 和属性进行设置 。These attributes are set using the , , , and properties. 您可以通过指定内容的垂直和水平对齐方式来控制单元格内容的显示方式。You can control how the content of a cell is displayed by specifying the vertical and horizontal alignment of the contents. 还可以指定在到达单元格的末尾时，是否自动在下一行上继续执行内容。You can also specify whether the content automatically continues on the next line when the end of the cell is reached. 水平对齐是由属性控制的 ，而属性则 控制垂直对齐。The horizontal alignment is controlled by the property, while the property controls the vertical alignment. 属性指示是否禁用文本换行。The property indicates whether text wrapping is disabled. 通过使用 或 属性，您可以控制单元格占据的列数或行数。By using the or the property, you can control the number of columns or rows that a cell occupies. 例如，可以通过将属性设置为来创建一个单元格，该单元格占据表中的两列 `2` 。For example, you can create a cell that occupies two columns in a table by setting the property to `2`. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表 ，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入，其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前，请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 还提供验证服务器控件以评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [验证服务器控制语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 修改表中单元格的内容。The following code example demonstrates how to use an to modify the contents of a cell in a table. 请注意， 控件的集合 包含 表中) (对象的集合。Note that the collection of an control contains a collection of the rows ( objects) in the table. 对象的集合 是 行中 (对象) 单元格的集合。The collection of an object is a collection of the cells ( objects) in a row. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCell#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCell/CS/htmltablecellcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCell#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCell/VB/htmltablecellvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 此构造函数用于创建一个 对象，该对象表示 `` 表数据单元的元素。This constructor is used to create an object that represents the `` element for a table data cell. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值 。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |propertiesProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"Td" 文本字符串。The "td" literal string.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件创建控件的实例 ，并将表放置在网页上。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of an control with controls and place the table on the Web page. 请注意如何 使用控件的无参数构造函数创建一个 `` 元素，而它的重载构造函数采用字符串参数，用于创建 `` 元素。Note how the control's parameterless constructor is used to create a `` element, while its overloaded constructor that takes a string parameter is used with the literal string "th" to create a `` element. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCtor/CS/htmltablectorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCtor/VB/htmltablectorvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 它允许创建 表示控件中的单元格的对象 。It allows you to create an object that represents a cell in an control. 它通常用于创建一个 对象，该对象表示 `` 表标题单元格的元素。It is commonly used to create an object that represents a `` element for a table heading cell. 尽管可以使用此构造函数来创建 `` 表数据单元的元素，但通常使用无参数的构造函数。Although you can use this constructor to create a `` element for a table data cell, you typically use the parameterless constructor. > [!NOTE] > 尽管此构造函数允许你指定要创建的单元元素，但 `` 元素是唯一受支持的单元元素。Although this constructor allows you to specify the cell element to create, the `` element is the only supported cell element. 为了实现将来的兼容性，此构造函数允许你创建可能会变得可用的其他 HTML 单元元素。For future compatibility, this constructor allows you to create other HTML cell elements that could become available. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值 。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |propertiesProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`tagName` 参数的值。The value of the `tagName` parameter.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件创建控件的实例 ，并将表放置在网页上。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of an control with controls and place the table on the Web page. 请注意如何 使用控件的无参数构造函数来创建 `` 元素，而它的重载构造函数采用字符串参数，以创建 `` 元素。Note how the control's parameterless constructor is used to create a `` element, while its overloaded constructor that takes a string parameter is used with the literal "th" to create a `` element. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCtor/CS/htmltablectorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCtor/VB/htmltablectorvb.aspx#1)]

member this.Align : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置由 类的实例所表示的单元格中内容的水平对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the content in the cell represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 由 的实例表示的单元格中的内容的水平对齐方式。

span.span: The horizontal alignment of the content in the cell represented by an instance of .

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以指定由类的实例所表示的单元格中内容的水平对齐方式 。Use the property to specify the horizontal alignment of the content in a cell represented by an instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性仅影响类的实例所表示的单元格 。Setting this property affects only the cell represented by an instance of the class. 若要对表中整行的单元格应用相同的对齐方式，请设置 由类的实例所表示的行的属性 。To apply the same alignment to the cells of an entire row in the table, set the property of the row represented by an instance of the class. 下表列出了可用于此属性的值。The following table lists the values that can be used for this property. |“值”Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`Left`|将单元格的内容与单元格的左边缘对齐。Aligns the contents of a cell with the left edge of the cell.| |`Center`|将单元格的内容在单元格中居中对齐。Aligns the contents of a cell in the middle of the cell.| |`Right`|将单元格的内容与单元格的右边缘对齐。Aligns the contents of a cell with the right edge of the cell.| > [!NOTE] > 你还可以使用 `Justify` 和 `Char` 作为此属性的值; 但是，并非所有浏览器都支持这些功能。You can also use `Justify` and `Char` as values for this property; however, not all browsers support these features. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以 编程方式控制控件中单元格内容的对齐方式 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the alignment of the contents of the cells in an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellBehavior/CS/htmltablecellbehaviorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellBehavior/VB/htmltablecellbehaviorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BgColor { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.BgColor : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置由 类的实例所表示的单元格的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the cell represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 的实例所表示的单元格的背景色。

span.span: The background color of the cell represented by an instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以指定由类的实例所表示的单元格的背景色 。Use the property to specify the background color of the cell represented by an instance of the class. 您可以按名称指定颜色，也可以使用十六进制值（前面带有井号字符） ( # ) ，格式为 #RRGGBB。You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB. RR、GG 和 BB 表示0到255之间的十六进制值，分别指示颜色的红色、绿色和蓝色成分。RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively. 例如，值 #0000FF 表示蓝色。For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue. 它指定红色和绿色分量 (00) 的最小值，同时指定蓝色分量 (FF) 的最大值。It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component. 下表显示了十六种预定义的 HTML 颜色名称以及可用于属性的相应十六进制值 。The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the property. 有关 HTML 颜色的详细信息，请参阅 [W3C) 网站 (万维网联合会](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). |颜色名称Color name|十六进制值Hexadecimal value| |----------------|-----------------------| |AquaAqua|#00FFFF#00FFFF| |黑色Black|#000000#000000| |蓝色Blue|#0000FF#0000FF| |FuchsiaFuchsia|#FF00FF#FF00FF| |灰色Gray|#808080#808080| |绿色Green|#008000#008000| |酸Lime|#00FF00#00FF00| |褐紫红色Maroon|#800000#800000| |NavyNavy|#000080#000080| |橄榄绿Olive|#808000#808000| |紫色Purple|#800080#800080| |RedRed|#FF0000#FF0000| |SilverSilver|#C0C0C0#C0C0C0| |青色Teal|#008080#008080| |WhiteWhite|#FFFFFF#FFFFFF| |YellowYellow|#FFFF00#FFFF00| 可从枚举确定用于属性的可用颜色 。The available colors for use with the property can be determined from the enumeration. 颜色名称不区分大小写。Color names are case-insensitive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以 编程方式控制控件中单元格的背景色 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the background color of the cells in an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellAppearance/CS/htmltablecellappearancecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellAppearance/VB/htmltablecellappearancevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置由 类的实例所表示的单元格的边框颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the border color of the cell represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 的实例所表示的单元格的边框颜色。

span.span: The border color of the cell represented by an instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以指定由类的实例所表示的单元格的边框颜色 。Use the property to specify the border color of the cell represented by an instance of the class. 您可以按名称指定颜色，也可以使用十六进制值（前面带有井号字符） ( # ) ，格式为 #RRGGBB。You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB. RR、GG 和 BB 表示0到255之间的十六进制值，分别指示颜色的红色、绿色和蓝色成分。RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively. 例如，值 #0000FF 表示蓝色。For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue. 它指定红色和绿色分量 (00) 的最小值，同时指定蓝色分量 (FF) 的最大值。It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component. 下表显示了十六种预定义的 HTML 颜色名称以及可用于属性的相应十六进制值 。The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the property. 有关 HTML 颜色的详细信息，请参阅 [W3C) 网站 (万维网联合会](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125) 。For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125) site. |颜色名称Color name|十六进制值Hexadecimal value| |----------------|-----------------------| |AquaAqua|#00FFFF#00FFFF| |黑色Black|#000000#000000| |蓝色Blue|#0000FF#0000FF| |FuchsiaFuchsia|#FF00FF#FF00FF| |灰色Gray|#808080#808080| |绿色Green|#008000#008000| |酸Lime|#00FF00#00FF00| |褐紫红色Maroon|#800000#800000| |NavyNavy|#000080#000080| |橄榄绿Olive|#808000#808000| |紫色Purple|#800080#800080| |RedRed|#FF0000#FF0000| |SilverSilver|#C0C0C0#C0C0C0| |青色Teal|#008080#008080| |WhiteWhite|#FFFFFF#FFFFFF| |YellowYellow|#FFFF00#FFFF00| 可从枚举确定用于属性的可用颜色 。The available colors for use with the property can be determined from the enumeration. 颜色名称不区分大小写。Color names are case-insensitive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以 编程方式控制控件中单元格的边框颜色 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the border color of the cells in an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellAppearance/CS/htmltablecellappearancecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellAppearance/VB/htmltablecellappearancevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ColSpan { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ColSpan : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置由 类的实例所表示的单元格占用的列数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of columns occupied by a cell represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 的实例所表示的单元格所占用的列数。

span.span: The number of columns occupied by the cell represented by an instance of .

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在由类的实例表示的单元格中 ，使用 属性指定单元格所占据的列数。In a cell represented by an instance of the class, use the property to specify the number of columns the cell occupies. 这允许您在表中创建占据多列的单元格。This allows you to create a cell in the table that occupies more than one column. 例如，假设您有一个包含两列和两行的表。For example, suppose you have a table that contains two columns and two rows. 您可以创建跨两个列的表标题单元格。You can create a table heading cell that spans both columns. 将 第一行中最左边的单元格的属性设置为 `2` ，以指示此单元格占据表中的两列。Set the property of the leftmost cell in the first row to `2` to indicate that this cell takes up two columns in the table. > [!CAUTION] > 跨列时，请确保在该行中为你跨越的每个列定义一个单元格。When spanning columns, be sure to define one fewer cell in the row for each column that you span. 例如，如果跨越两个列，请在当前行中定义一个单元格。For example, if you span two columns, define one fewer cell in the current row. 否则，该行的长度将大于表中的列数，并且表将不会按预期方式显示。Otherwise, that row will be longer than the number of columns in the table and the table will not be displayed as expected. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定控件的第一行中的单元格 占据两列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the cell in the first row of the control takes up two columns. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellColSpan#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellColSpan/CS/htmltablecellcolspancs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellColSpan#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellColSpan/VB/htmltablecellcolspanvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置由 类的实例所表示的单元格的高度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the height (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 的实例所表示的单元格的高度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The height (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of .

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以指定由类的实例所表示的单元格的高度 (（以像素为单位）) 。Use the property to specify the height (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of the class. 指定单元格的高度时，同一行中的所有单元格都将自动共享该高度。When you specify the height of a cell, all cells in the same row automatically share that height. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定的高度小于显示该单元格的内容所需的高度，则将忽略此属性。If you specify a height that is smaller than is required to display the contents of the cell, this property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性以编程方式控制控件中单元格的高度 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the height of the cells in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellAppearance/CS/htmltablecellappearancecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellAppearance/VB/htmltablecellappearancevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当到达单元格末尾时，由 类的实例所表示的单元格中的文本是否自动继续在下一行显示。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text in a cell represented by an instance of the class automatically continues on the next line when it reaches the end of the cell.

value.span: 如果在单元格中文本不自动换行，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the text does not automatically wrap in the cell; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定或确定由类的实例表示的单元格中的文本在 到达单元格末尾时是否自动在下一行上继续。Use the property to specify or determine whether the text in a cell represented by an instance of the class automatically continues on the next line when it reaches the end of the cell. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以 编程方式控制文本是否换行到控件的单元格中 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control whether the text wraps in the cells of an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellBehavior/CS/htmltablecellbehaviorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellBehavior/VB/htmltablecellbehaviorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 呈现 控件的结束标记。

span.span: Renders the control's end tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在调用基类的方法之后提供其他格式设置 。The method provides additional formatting after calling the base class's method. 其他格式设置通过在 结束标记后添加一个行返回，使控件呈现的 HTML 更易于读取。The additional formatting makes the control's rendered HTML easier to read by adding a line return after the closing tag. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件的功能 。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

span.span: The number of rows occupied by a cell represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在由类的实例表示的单元格中 ，使用 属性指定单元格所占据的行数。In a cell represented by an instance of the class, use the property to specify the number of rows the cell occupies. 这允许您在表中创建占据多行的单元格。This allows you to create a cell in the table that occupies more than one row. 例如，假设您有一个包含两列和两行的表。For example, suppose you have a table that contains two columns and two rows. 您可以创建与这两行重叠的列。You can create a column that overlaps both rows. 将 第一列中最左边的单元格的属性设置为 `2` ，以指示此单元格在表中占据两行。Set the property of the leftmost cell in the first column to `2` to indicate that this cell takes up two rows in the table. > [!CAUTION] > 跨越行时，请确保为你跨越的每一行的列中的单元格分别定义一个。When spanning rows, be sure to define one fewer cell in the column for each row that you span. 例如，如果您跨越两行，则在该列中定义一个单元格。For example, if you span two rows, define one fewer cell in that column. 否则，该列的长度将超过表中的行数，并且表将不会按预期方式显示。Otherwise, that column will be longer than the number of rows in the table and the table will not be displayed as expected. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定控件的第一列中的单元格 跨越两行。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the cell in the first column of the control spans two rows. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellRowSpan#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellRowSpan/CS/htmltablecellrowspancs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellRowSpan#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellRowSpan/VB/htmltablecellrowspanvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VAlign { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.VAlign : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置由 类的实例所表示的单元格内容的垂直对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the vertical alignment for the content of a cell represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 的实例所表示的单元格的内容的垂直对齐方式。

span.span: The vertical alignment for the content of a cell represented by an instance of .

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以指定由类的实例所表示的单元格中的内容的垂直对齐方式 。Use the property to specify the vertical alignment of the content in a cell represented by an instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性仅影响类的实例所表示的单元格 。Setting this property affects only the cell represented by an instance of the class. 若要对表中整行的单元格应用相同的垂直对齐方式，请设置 由类的实例所表示的行的属性 。To apply the same vertical alignment to the cells of an entire row in the table, set the property of the row represented by an instance of the class. 下表列出了可用于此属性的值。The following table lists the values that can be used for this property. |“值”Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`Top`|将单元格的内容与单元格的上边缘对齐。Aligns the contents of a cell with the upper edge of the cell.| |`Middle`|将单元格的内容与单元格的中心对齐。Aligns the contents of a cell in the center of the cell.| |`Bottom`|将单元格的内容与单元格的下边缘对齐。Aligns the contents of a cell with the lower edge of the cell.| > [!NOTE] > 你还可以使用 `BaseLine` 作为此属性的值。You can also use `BaseLine` as a value for this property. 但是，并非所有浏览器都支持此功能。However, not all browsers support this feature. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以 编程方式控制控件中单元格内容的垂直对齐方式 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the vertical alignment of the contents of the cells in an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellBehavior/CS/htmltablecellbehaviorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellBehavior/VB/htmltablecellbehaviorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Width { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Width : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置由 类的实例所表示的单元格的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the width (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 的实例所表示的单元格的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The width (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of .

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以指定由类的实例所表示的单元格的宽度 (（以像素为单位）) 。Use the property to specify the width (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of the class. 指定单元格的宽度时，同一列中的所有单元格都将自动共享该宽度。When you specify the width for a cell, all cells in the same column automatically share that width. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定的宽度小于显示单元格内容所需的宽度，则忽略此属性。If you specify a width that is smaller than is required to display the contents of the cell, this property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性以编程方式控制控件中单元格的宽度 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the width of the cells in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellAppearance/CS/htmltablecellappearancecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellAppearance/VB/htmltablecellappearancevb.aspx#1)]
